title: Java-Webchat
description:
Java-Webchat is a lightweight RMI-based chat interface designed to be small and portable. It allows multiple clients to chat with each other through a central server.

Java-Webchat was a final project for ICS4U1, grade 12 computer science, which culminated all of the knowledge learned through the course. It features the use of JavaFX because it created a modern and very aesthetically pleasing design.

Find the source for this project here!
